name: No Sunshine
description:
No Sunshine is a short interactive story I made for the Global Game Jam in 2019. 

CW: This game depicts loss, depression and mental health problems

The game is made in my own story engine Yarnspin, and is also meant to serve as an example game for making your own Yarns.

The Yarnspin engine can be found here: https://mattiasgustavsson.itch.io/yarnspin
